title: Portable Apps v1.1
description:
Right... to start off, if i see any hit and runs on this torrent i&#039;m not gonna seed it anymore.  Already tried over at mininova and it didn&#039;t go so well.  God damn it people SEED after you download (to at least a 1:1 ratio).

The NFO:

Portable Apps v1.1

*UPDATE*:

I&#039;ve decided to udpate the torrent with some new release and updates of the applications in here.
The list has more or less stayed the same, and i&#039;ve compressed most of the files so you dont&#039; have to scroll through
a bunch of .dlls when you download this torrents.

Some things that have been updated:

-Adobe Photoshop CS3 Extended (from Beta to Extended)
-7 Zip
-Sumatra PDF Reader (v0.5 to v0.7)
-CCleaner (v1.4.1)
-Utorrent (v1.7.2)

And probably a couple more which i forgot to mention.

Some things that have been added:

-ConvertxtoDVD Portable
-AVG Antivirus 7.5 Portable
-A bunch of portable applications from www.portableapps.com
-Windows Live Mesenger portable v8.1.0178
-Portable Kaspersky AntiVirus v7.0.0.120

Requirments are the same as before (see below).

I won&#039;t be posting a new list of software, since there isn&#039;t THAT much added.

One last thing, you WILL need a decompressing software of some sort (Winrar, Winzip, Power archiver, 7-Zip, etc.) to extract
a lot of these files, as they are compressed to keep the torrent small.

Remember,
All credits go to the original authors for these applications. Credits go to me for putting it together and uploading it. =)
